snippet: Representative Lamar Smith defends his bill to allow the brightest foreign students to stay in America.
abstract: Letter from Rep Lamar Smith of Texas responds to Sept 27 editorial warning that the STEM Jobs Act would eliminate program providing visas to countries with low immigration rates.
lead_paragraph: Representative Lamar Smith defends his bill to allow the brightest foreign students to stay in America.

headline.main: Visas for Top Graduates: A View From Capitol Hill
headline.print_headline: Visas for Top Graduates: A View From Capitol Hill
